amma kiyana hama nalawili giyema theruma ahana nisa..eeth ape amma mawa nalawala thiyenneth aa wisinma thoragath gi kihipayak gayamin..in ekak nanda maliniya gayana "sarungale waral sale" kiyana giya.ehi gambauru arutha wana aasiyanu buddhi galanaya gana adahasa kisisethma notherunath "sarungale numbaa ahase ape lamayi thama bimayi" kiyaddi ee gana sanwedi wena hithak athi karanna mage amma in samath wela thiyenawa..ma wenuwen aya gayu nalawili gi athara thawath ek suwisheshi giyak thiyenawa..ee thamayi marsi edirisinha mahathmiya gayana "made lagina tharawun nawannada man" kiyana giyaissella kiwwa wage hama padayakama theruma ahana mawa oya giya gayala nalawaddi nam aya " chapala himita siriyahane rawatennada man" kiyana pada peliya ma wenuwen gayala naha.
